titleStmt.title: Samuel G. Suddarth, Receipt to James H. Drain
CWG13700

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; 1863 Office Expenses - Telegraph, Stationary - Transportation - Ordinance Stores; Bundle 3

body.p:
NO. 22.The State of Kentucky
The United States,
To Jas. H. Drain Dr

(hawling stores, water subsistance)
at Eminence camp

Appeared
By order of the Governor
Jno. W Finnell
Adjt Genl Ky Vols
Approved Richard T. Jacob co. 9th Ky. cv.
I Certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated: and that they were a necessary for the Public Service.

chas. a clarke Lt & R. Q. M
9th Ky Cavalry
Received at Frankfort, the 18" of Dec, 18632, S. G. Suddarth Q. M. Genl, Quartermaster of U.S. Army ^State of Ky", the sum of Eight Dollars and Cents, in full of the above account.

No. 22.No. 70 Abstract B U Qr. 1862.
Jas H Drain
Dollars 8 /100
Paid Decr 18 18632
Transportation
J232
